/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings lining the street are painted in vibrant hues of red and orange, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. In the distance, trees can be seen, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures.
